CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Targeted_Registration__c),0, Qualified_Leads__c / Registered_Target__c )
/* As of 01-15-2020:
formula formerly written:
IF(ISNULL(Targeted_Registration__c) = TRUE,0, Qualified_Leads__c / Registered_Target__c )
Changed Blank Field Handling to "Treat blank fields as blanks" to avoid #Error result in reports due to dividing by 0.
-Jeff
*/
CustomField.label: Tar %
